TextView.android:text:
To win the game you have to guess the word selected by the computer within 10 tries(12 in Difficult Mode).

The Word is always,
	1)A Dictionary Word.
	2)A Four letter word.
	3)A word with only unique letters.

The Word you submit should also follow the above rules(Rule 1 is compulsory in Difficult Mode).
After you submit your word you get the count of red brick and green brick for your word,

A Red Brick tells that the letter is present in the word but the position is incorrect.
A Green Brick tells that the letter is present in the word and at the right position.
(Click on the three dots while playing for help)

For example Let the word be TASK and you submit BARN, you get one Green Brick(The letter A), if you submit SOIL, you get one Red Brick(The letter S).

Based on the Bricks try and guess the word.

All the best.
